name: LUDOCOV
description:
The game consists of two players.
Each player makes their move by clicking on the die.
If in its way the player drops in a tile with corona virus then he will get infected.
After that in each move the player will lose its health in every consecutive steps.
The player has an initial threshold of 5 points and which degrades by each step after getting infected.
If the player succeeds to drop in a sanitizer, then he gets healed up and its health points gets reset to 5.
If the player drops in a immunity pill, then he will get immuned for one encounter with a corona virus. The effect will remain same if the player drops in more than one immunity pill also.
